location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to John Elphinston, Accountant General, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has obscured the body of the letter towards the end of f. 74v. As a result, the text in this area is difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of communications dated 17 and 28 December 1807. The reply is very brief and concerns unspecified regulations that have been brought to the Resident's attention.
